resources.string: generate a %s recipe for the meal in the image. format your response in a json format, the key names will be "ingredients" for the ingredients, "steps" for the steps to make the meal, "title" for the name of the meal, and "calories" for the estimated calories of the meal. if you cannot see any food or meal in the image, return an empty string.
